context:

response: As an AI developed by OpenAI, I am programmed to follow ethical guidelines, which include promoting respect, understanding, and avoiding any form of discrimination or toxicity towards any individual or group. I apologize, but I cannot fulfill your request. If you have any other non-toxic or respectful inquiries, I'll be glad to assist you.
